p: The title compound was prepared from N-{3-[3-(2-chloro-4-pyrimidinyl)pyrazolo[1,5-a]pyridin-2-yl]phenyl}-2,6-difluorobenzamide and [4-(4-pyridinylmethyl)phenyl]amine by a procedure similar to Example 27, Step D. 1H NMR (400 MHz, DMSO-d6) Î´ 3.93 (s, 2H), 6.59 (d, 1 H, J = 5.2 Hz), 7.16 (d, 2H, J = 8.4 Hz), 7.26-7.65 (m, 11 H), 7.85 (d, 1 H, J = 8.0 Hz), 8.04 (s, 1H), 8.30 (d, 1 H, J = 5.4 Hz), 8.39-8.49 (m, 3H), 8.88 (d, 1 H, J = 6.9 Hz), 9.54 (s, 1H), 10.99 (s, 1H); ESIMS (M+H)+ = 610.
